title: Joe Coomer (American football)
text:
Joe David Coomer (September 11, 1917October 18, 1979) was a professional <a href="American%20football">American football</a> player who played <a href="offensive%20guard">offensive guard</a> and <a href="defensive%20tackle">defensive tackle</a> for six seasons for the <a href="Pittsburgh%20Steelers">Pittsburgh Steelers</a> and the <a href="Chicago%20Cardinals%20%28NFL%2C%201920%E2%80%9359%29">Chicago Cardinals</a>. 
Biography.
He was born in September 1917. He went to <a href="Austin%20College">Austin College</a>. He played professional American football for a total of 62 games.
